title: Perfect Dark (Emulator with Keyboard and Mouse) playthrough -- Part 4
description: Finished it up and beat all the bonus levels except for one of them because I was getting tired of it. Great game, loved almost every second of it. Too bad the emulator had some issues with OBS, but the mouse and keyboard stuff was flawless and a really fun way to play the game. Highly recommend it.

Three are unlocked by completing the game at higher difficulties - one for each difficulty. (i.e. you unlock the first for Agent, the first 2 on SA, and three on PA)
The fourth you get by completing the gadget training levels.
